title_en: Monthly CPI Inflation by State & Division (2-digit)
title_ms: Inflasi IHP Bulanan mengikut Negeri & Bahagian (2-digit)
description_en: State-level CPI inflation for 13 main groups of goods and services
description_ms: Inflasi IHP peringkat negeri bagi 13 kumpulan utama barangan dan perkhidmatan.
methodology_en: The CPI measures the cost of purchasing a constant, representative 'basket' of goods and services. The quantity and quality of goods in the basket are kept constant, so that changes in the cost of the basket are purely due to price changes. The changes in the cost of this basket represent the rate of inflation. For a deeper understanding of the price collection and CPI computation methodology, please refer to the [Technical Notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/cpi-technotes). Finally, it should be noted that Malaysia's CPI classification is deliberately consistent with the United Nations Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP) to ensure international comparability.
methodology_ms: IHP mengukur kos pembelian bagi 'bakul' tetap barangan dan perkhidmatan yang mewakili corak purata pembelian penduduk Malaysia. Kualiti dan kuantiti item dalam bakul ini tidak berubah, maka perubahan kos bakul ini disebabkan oleh perubahan harga sahaja. Perubahan kos bakul inilah yang mewakili kadar inflasi. Untuk mendapat pemahaman yang lebih mendalam tentang metodologi pemungutan harga dan perangkaan IHP, sila rujuk kepada [Nota Teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/technical-notes/cpi-technotes). Akhirnya, sila ambil maklum bahawa klasifikasi IHP Malaysia dipastikan konsisten dengan United Nations Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP) demi membolehkan perbandingan antarabangsa.
caveat_en: When interpreting inflation rates derived from the CPI, it is important to remember that the rate of inflation experienced by a specific individual may be higher or lower than this number. This does not invalidate the CPI, which is meant to be an average value representative of the entire population.
caveat_ms: Dalam mentafsirkan kadar inflasi yang dihasilkan berdasarkan IHP, perlu diingati bahawa inflasi yang dirasai oleh mana-mana individu mungkin lebih tinggi atau lebih rendah daripada angka ini. Ini tidak bermaksud bahawa angka IHP tidak betul, kerana IHP dirangka sebagai angka purata yang mewakili seluruh penduduk.
publication_en: [Consumer Price Index, Aug 2025](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/cpi_2025-08), the latest edition of the monthly consumer price statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on consumer prices](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/consumer-prices).
publication_ms: [Indeks Harga Pengguna, Ogo 2025](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/cpi_2025-08), edisi terkini bagi statistik harga pengguna yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang harga pengguna](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/consumer-prices).

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with DD set to 01 as the data is at monthly frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan DD diberi nilai 01 kerana data berfrekuensi bulanan

fields.name: division
fields.description_en: [String] 2-digit code from 01-13 or 'overall', to be matched using the 'division' column in the [MCOICOP Lookup](https://open.dosm.gov.my/data-catalogue/mcoicop). The MCOICOP lookup table will give you the English and Malay definitions.
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Kod 2 digit dari 01-13 ataupun keseluruhan ('overall'), yang perlu dipadankan dengan medan 'division' dalam [Jadual MCOICOP](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/data-catalogue/mcoicop). Padanan tersebut akan membolehkan anda mendapat keterangan dalam Bahasa Inggeris dan Bahasa Melayu.

fields.name: inflation_yoy
fields.description_en: [Float] Year-on-year inflation, i.e. the percentage change in the CPI since 12 months ago
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Inflasi tahunan, iaitu peratusan perubahan IHP sejak 12 bulan lalu

fields.name: inflation_mom
fields.description_en: [Float] Month-on-month inflation, i.e. Percentage change in the CPI since 1 month ago
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Inflasi bulanan, iaitu peratusan perubahan IHP sejak 1 bulan laliu

translations_en.13: Personal Care, Social Protection & Miscellaneous Goods and Services

translations_ms.04: Perumahan, Utiliti, Gas & Bahan Api Lain
translations_ms.13: Penjagaan Diri, Perlindungan Sosial & Pelbagai Barangan dan Perkhidmatan

related_datasets.description_en: National-level CPI for 13 main groups of goods and services.
related_datasets.description_ms: IHP peringkat nasional bagi 13 kumpulan utama barangan dan perkhidmatan.
